guarantors.description: Guarantor information. A guarantor is the person whose credit report will be pulled during the underwriting process.

RoleName.title: RoleName
RoleName.description:
The role of the signer. Please note the below.

 1) Merchant role name is mandatory.
 2) Required fields indicated in schema are those required for all role names other than "SalesRep"
 3) The "SalesRep" role name only requires the following fields > roleName, signingExperience, signingOrder, firstName, lastName, email
 4) The "Signer2" role name is for a Personal Guarantor. This signer must be included if a Personal Guarantor is on the application. Include the Guarnator's information in this object.

AddressType.title: AddressType
AddressType.description:
Address Type  
 1) Physical address is mandatory.
 2) If equipment needs to be sent to a different location than the physical address, then shipping address should be added.
3) For any address type, addressLine1, city, state, postalCode and country are mandatory.

Type1.title: Type1
Type1.description:
Type of merchant contact.   
 1) Only primary contact
      is mandatory. May be the same as any owner contact information. 
 2) For primary contact, firstName, lastName, phoneNumber and email are mandatory during POST.  
 3) For all other contact types, firstName and lastName are mandatory during POST.

Type4.title: Type4
Type4.description:
Type of merchant contact.   
 1) Only primary contact
      is mandatory. May be the same as any owner contact information. 
 2) For primary contact, firstName, lastName, phoneNumber and email are mandatory during POST.  
 3) For all other contact types, firstName and lastName are mandatory during POST.

UsageExample.HttpCallTemplate: {"method":"GET","url":"{% case environment %}{% when "production" %}https://apis.cert.worldpay.com/merchant-boarding/v2{% when "environment2" %}https://apis.cert.worldpay.com/merchant-boarding/v1{% else %}envrr{% endcase %}/applications{% capture inline_query_capture_876234 %}{% endcapture %}{% if inline_query_capture_876234.size > 0 %}?{% endif %}{{ inline_query_capture_876234 | remove_first:'&' }}","headers":{% capture header_capture_9023987234 %},"Accept":"application/json","externalRefId":{{ call["args"]["externalRefId"] | unwrap | json: false }}{% if call["args"]["v-correlation-id"] != nil %},"v-correlation-id":{{ call["args"]["v-correlation-id"] | unwrap | json: false }}{% endif %}{% if auth["api_key"]["Authorization"] != nil %},"Authorization":{{ auth["api_key"]["Authorization"] | json: false }}{% endif %}{% endcapture %}{{ '{' }}{{ header_capture_9023987234 | remove_first:',' }}},"body":{{ '{' }}"type":"none"}}

Templates.HTTP_CURL_V1:
curl -X GET \
  --url '{% case environment %}{% when 'production' %}https://apis.cert.worldpay.com/merchant-boarding/v2{% when 'environment2' %}https://apis.cert.worldpay.com/merchant-boarding/v1{% else %}envrr{% endcase %}/applications'  \
  -H 'Accept: application/json' \
  -H 'externalRefId: {{ call["args"]["externalRefId"] | unwrap | json | replace: "'", "'\\''" | replace: "\n", "\\\\n" | replace: "\r", "\\\\r" }}'{% if call["args"]["v-correlation-id"] != nil %} \
  -H 'v-correlation-id: {{ call["args"]["v-correlation-id"] | unwrap | json | replace: "'", "'\\''" | replace: "\n", "\\\\n" | replace: "\r", "\\\\r" }}'{% endif %}{% if auth["api_key"]["Authorization"] != nil %} \
  -H 'Authorization: {{ auth["api_key"]["Authorization"] }}'{% endif %}

Fields.Name: externalRefId
Fields.Description:
A unique GUID generated by POST resource, used for retrieving and updating a deal. Do not send in the request, API will always generate one and assign it to the deal.
**Constraints**: *Maximum Length*: `36`, *Pattern*: `([0-9a-z]{8})-([0-9a-z]{4})-([0-9a-z]{4})-([0-9a-z]{4})-([0-9a-z]{12})`

Fields.Name: leadSource
Fields.Description:
The source of a lead.
**Constraints**: *Maximum Length*: `12`

Fields.Name: guarantors
Fields.Description:
Guarantor information. A guarantor is the person whose credit report will be pulled during the underwriting process.
**Constraints**: *Unique Items Required*

Fields.Name: contacts
Fields.Description: **Constraints**: *Unique Items Required*

Fields.Name: addresses
Fields.Description: **Constraints**: *Unique Items Required*

Fields.Name: salesAgent
Fields.Description: The agent who is submitting the deal.

Fields.Name: installationContact
Fields.Description: The Technical Agent who is going to do setup.

Fields.Name: routeToSalesRep
Fields.Description: Used to route a application to a worldpay or partner sales rep. By default the API is configured to route to a Worldpay sales rep. If you would like to route to partner (Launchpad UI) please work with your implementation consultant.

Fields.Name: dbaName
Fields.Description:
The merchant name they do business as. Generally with what their customers know the business.
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `1`, *Maximum Length*: `50`

Fields.Name: legalName
Fields.Description:
Business Legal Name as filed with the IRS.
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `1`, *Maximum Length*: `50`

Fields.Name: ownershipType
Fields.Description: Required. OwnershipType defines the type of the Merchant Organization, and drives the requirements for data collections of beneficial and control owners under U.S. Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (FinCEN).

Fields.Name: mccCode
Fields.Description:
SIC Code / MCC Code (Merchant Category Code) is the code use to describe what the merchant is selling. Use MCC look up call to search valid codes, with sort and long description to find the MCC that most closely matches what the merchant is selling.
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `4`, *Maximum Length*: `4`

Fields.Name: businessEstablishedDate
Fields.Description: Date (CCYY-MM-DD) on which the merchant's business was established.

Fields.Name: websiteUrl
Fields.Description:
The URL of the merchant's website.
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `0`, *Maximum Length*: `80`

Fields.Name: numberOfLocation
Fields.Description: Number of current locations.

Fields.Name: federalTaxId
Fields.Description:
The Federal Tax ID is the business Tax Identification Number (TIN) or Employer Identification Number (EIN). If the business is a sole proprietor they may use the social security number of the sole proprietor.
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `9`, *Maximum Length*: `9`, *Pattern*: `^[0-9]{9}$`

Fields.Name: paymentAcceptanceMethod
Fields.Description: The ways in which the business is accepting payments. Multiple options may be selected. 'In person', would be card present at a brick and mortar store, 'onlinesite' would be card not present use on an ecommerce website, and 'phoneormailorder' would be card not present used for mail and telephone orders.

Fields.Name: pciadc
Fields.Description:
Indication if the merchant has had an account data compromise.
**Default**: `No`

Fields.Name: pcidssValidated
Fields.Description:
Indictor showing if the merchant is compliant or not with the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standards.
**Default**: `Yes`

Fields.Name: surroundingArea
Fields.Description: Type of area surroundning the business.

Fields.Name: productServiceSold
Fields.Description:
Type of goods or services sold.
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `1`, *Maximum Length*: `40`, *Pattern*: `(^[-a-zA-Z0-9_ &()*+,./:;=_'‘]{1,40}$)`

Fields.Name: ownAddYears
Fields.Description:
Years the business has been operating in their current location.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 99`

Fields.Name: lengthOfContract
Fields.Description:
Inital contract term in months.
**Constraints**: *Pattern*: `([0-9]{3})$`

Fields.Name: seasonal
Fields.Description: Does the business operate seasonally?

Fields.Name: activeMonths
Fields.Description: The months during which the business is actively operating.

Fields.Name: warranty
Fields.Description: Does the business offer warranties, dues, subscriptions, memberships, or other extended services?

Fields.Name: returnPolicy
Fields.Description: The business's return policy.

Fields.Name: acceptCreditCards
Fields.Description: Does the business accept credit cards?

Fields.Name: annualSalesVolume
Fields.Description:
Projected annual sales volume.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 9999999999999.99`

Fields.Name: percentRetailSwipedTransactions
Fields.Description:
Projected Percentage of daily card-present transactions.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 100`

Fields.Name: averageTicket
Fields.Description:
Average ticket dollar amount.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 9999999.99`

Fields.Name: highestTicket
Fields.Description:
Highest ticket dollar amount.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 9999999.99`

Fields.Name: currentProcessor
Fields.Description: the current processor

Fields.Name: acceptChargebacks
Fields.Description: Do you have more than 25 chargeback accepted in the last 12 months?

Fields.Name: chargebackPercent
Fields.Description:
Projected chargeback percentage. ```Required when acceptChargebacks is 'Yes'``` ```Optional when acceptChargebacks is null or 'No'.```
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 100`

Fields.Name: returnPercent
Fields.Description:
Projected return percent of goods sold
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 100`

Fields.Name: cardNotPresentPercent
Fields.Description:
Percent of card not present transactions.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 100`

Fields.Name: businessToBusinessPercent
Fields.Description:
Percent of business-to-business transactions.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 100`

Fields.Name: internetTransactionPercent
Fields.Description:
Percent of internet transactions.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 100`

Fields.Name: annualCreditSalesVolume
Fields.Description:
Projected annual credit card sales volume.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 999999999.99`

Fields.Name: annualDebitSalesVolume
Fields.Description:
Projected annual debit card sales volume.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 999999999.99`

Fields.Name: annualAmexVolume
Fields.Description:
Projected annual Amex volume. ``` This field is required when you opt-in for Amex ```
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 999999999.99`

Fields.Name: amexAverageTicket
Fields.Description:
AverageTicket dollar amount for Amex. ```This field is required when you opt-in for Amex```
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 9999999.99`

Fields.Name: averageNumberofDays
Fields.Description:
Average number of days from when cardholder is charged & when products or services are received IN FULL by cardholder.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`

Fields.Description:
Id for Technical Contact
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `1`, *Maximum Length*: `15`, *Pattern*: `^[a-zA-Z0-9 \p{P}\p{S}]+$`

Fields.Name: firstName
Fields.Description:
Contact's first name.
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `1`, *Maximum Length*: `15`, *Pattern*: `^[a-zA-Z0-9 \p{P}\p{S}]+$`

Fields.Name: lastName
Fields.Description:
Contact's last name.
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `1`, *Maximum Length*: `25`, *Pattern*: `^[a-zA-Z0-9 \p{P}\p{S}]+$`

Fields.Name: mobilePhoneNumber
Fields.Description:
Contact's 10-digit phone number of the format 5131234567.
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `10`, *Maximum Length*: `10`, *Pattern*: `([0-9]{10})$`

Fields.Name: email
Fields.Description:
Contact's email address. Must have @ and a .
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `1`, *Maximum Length*: `64`, *Pattern*: `(\\b[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@(?:[A-Za-z0-9-]+\\.)+[A-Za-z0-9]{2,}\\b{0,64})`

Nodes.Title: Installation Contact
Nodes.Name: InstallationContact
Nodes.Description: The Technical Agent who is going to do setup.

Fields.Name: externalRefId
Fields.Description:
A unique GUID generated by POST resource, used for retrieving and updating a deal. Do not send in the request, API will always generate one and assign it to the deal.
**Constraints**: *Maximum Length*: `36`, *Pattern*: `([0-9a-z]{8})-([0-9a-z]{4})-([0-9a-z]{4})-([0-9a-z]{4})-([0-9a-z]{12})`

Fields.Name: leadSource
Fields.Description:
The source of a lead.
**Constraints**: *Maximum Length*: `12`

Fields.Name: guarantors
Fields.Description:
Guarantor information. A guarantor is the person whose credit report will be pulled during the underwriting process.
**Constraints**: *Unique Items Required*

Fields.Name: contacts
Fields.Description: **Constraints**: *Unique Items Required*

Fields.Name: addresses
Fields.Description: **Constraints**: *Unique Items Required*

Fields.Name: bankAccount
Fields.Description: Bank account collects bank account information from merchant. It is optional till the time of boarding where bank account becomes required along with ddaType, achType, accountNumber, routingNumber & bankName.

Fields.Name: salesAgent
Fields.Description: The agent who is submitting the deal. It is an optional object. It becomes required, when  partner wants to route deals to their own sales rep. Please work with your integration specialist for route to sales rep functionality.

Fields.Name: installationContact
Fields.Description: The Technical Agent who is going to do setup.

Fields.Name: routeToSalesRep
Fields.Description: Used to route a application to a worldpay or partner sales rep. By default the API is configured to route to a Worldpay sales rep. If you would like to route to partner (Launchpad UI) please work with your implementation consultant.

Fields.Name: dbaName
Fields.Description:
The merchant name they do business as. Generally with what their customers know the business.
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `1`, *Maximum Length*: `50`

Fields.Name: legalName
Fields.Description:
Business Legal Name as filed with the IRS.
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `1`, *Maximum Length*: `40`, *Pattern*: `^([a-z0-9& -]{1,40})$`

Fields.Name: ownershipType
Fields.Description: Required. OwnershipType defines the type of the Merchant Organization, and drives the requirements for data collections of beneficial and control owners under U.S. Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (FinCEN).

Fields.Name: mccCode
Fields.Description:
SIC Code / MCC Code (Merchant Category Code) is the code use to describe what the merchant is selling. Use MCC look up call to search valid codes, with sort and long description to find the MCC that most closely matches what the merchant is selling.
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `4`, *Maximum Length*: `4`

Fields.Name: businessEstablishedDate
Fields.Description: Date (CCYY-MM-DD) on which the merchant's business was established.

Fields.Name: websiteUrl
Fields.Description:
The URL of the merchant's website.
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `0`, *Maximum Length*: `80`

Fields.Name: numberOfLocation
Fields.Description: Number of current locations.

Fields.Name: paymentAcceptanceMethod
Fields.Description: The ways in which the business is accepting payments. Multiple options may be selected. 'In person', would be card present at a brick and mortar store, 'onlinesite' would be card not present use on an ecommerce website, and 'phoneormailorder' would be card not present used for mail and telephone orders.

Fields.Name: pciadc
Fields.Description:
Indication if the merchant has had an account data compromise.
**Default**: `No`

Fields.Name: pcidssValidated
Fields.Description:
Indictor showing if the merchant is compliant or not with the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standards.
**Default**: `Yes`

Fields.Name: surroundingArea
Fields.Description: Type of area surroundning the business.

Fields.Name: productServiceSold
Fields.Description:
Type of goods or services sold.
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `1`, *Maximum Length*: `40`, *Pattern*: `(^[-a-zA-Z0-9_ &()*+,./:;=_'‘]{1,40}$)`

Fields.Name: ownAddYears
Fields.Description:
Years the business has been operating in their current location.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 99`

Fields.Name: lengthOfContract
Fields.Description:
Inital contract term in months.
**Constraints**: *Pattern*: `([0-9]{3})$`

Fields.Name: seasonal
Fields.Description: Does the business operate seasonally?

Fields.Name: activeMonths
Fields.Description: The months during which the business is actively operating.

Fields.Name: warranty
Fields.Description: Does the business offer warranties, dues, subscriptions, memberships, or other extended services?

Fields.Name: returnPolicy
Fields.Description: The business's return policy.

Fields.Name: acceptCreditCards
Fields.Description: Does the business accept credit cards?

Fields.Name: govOwnedMerchantCountry
Fields.Description: If merchant is a government entity or an entity at least 50% owned or controlled by government entity than provide 2 digit country code which belongs to the country.

Fields.Name: annualSalesVolume
Fields.Description:
Projected annual sales volume.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 9999999999999.99`

Fields.Name: percentRetailSwipedTransactions
Fields.Description:
Projected Percentage of daily card-present transactions.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 100`

Fields.Name: averageTicket
Fields.Description:
Average ticket dollar amount.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 9999999.99`

Fields.Name: highestTicket
Fields.Description:
Highest ticket dollar amount.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 9999999.99`

Fields.Name: currentProcessor
Fields.Description: the current processor

Fields.Name: acceptChargebacks
Fields.Description: Do you have more than 25 chargeback accepted in the last 12 months?

Fields.Name: chargebackPercent
Fields.Description:
Projected chargeback percentage. ```Required when acceptChargebacks is 'Yes'``` ```Optional when acceptChargebacks is null or 'No'.```
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 100`

Fields.Name: returnPercent
Fields.Description:
Projected return percent of goods sold
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 100`

Fields.Name: cardNotPresentPercent
Fields.Description:
Percent of card not present transactions.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 100`

Fields.Name: businessToBusinessPercent
Fields.Description:
Percent of business-to-business transactions.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 100`

Fields.Name: internetTransactionPercent
Fields.Description:
Percent of internet transactions.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 100`

Fields.Name: inPersonTransactionPercent
Fields.Description:
Percent of in person transactions.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 100`

Fields.Name: motoTransactionPercent
Fields.Description:
Percent of mail or phone order transactions.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 100`

Fields.Name: annualCreditSalesVolume
Fields.Description:
Projected annual credit card sales volume.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 999999999.99`

Fields.Name: annualDebitSalesVolume
Fields.Description:
Projected annual debit card sales volume.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 999999999.99`

Fields.Name: annualAmexVolume
Fields.Description:
Projected annual Amex volume. ``` This field is required when you opt-in for Amex ```
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 999999999.99`

Fields.Name: amexAverageTicket
Fields.Description:
AverageTicket dollar amount for Amex. ```This field is required when you opt-in for Amex```
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 9999999.99`

Fields.Name: averageNumberofDays
Fields.Description:
Average number of days from when cardholder is charged & when products or services are received IN FULL by cardholder.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 365`

Fields.Name: needsProcessingBy
Fields.Description: Date (CCYY-MM-DD) by which the Equipment needs to be setup. This field may be required for a given partner.

Fields.Name: type
Fields.Description: The Owner Type. Please note the above Ownership Types where a Control Owner is required.

Fields.Name: title
Fields.Description:
Required for AMEX acquired merchants otherwise optional.
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `1`, *Maximum Length*: `30`, *Pattern*: `^[a-zA-Z0-9 \p{P}\p{S}]+$`

Fields.Name: firstName
Fields.Description:
First name. Region based validations will be applied to this field.
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `1`, *Maximum Length*: `15`, *Pattern*: `^[a-zA-Z0-9 \p{P}\p{S}]+$`

Fields.Name: middleInitial
Fields.Description:
Middle initial.
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `1`, *Maximum Length*: `1`, *Pattern*: `^[a-zA-Z0-9 \p{P}\p{S}]+$`

Fields.Name: lastName
Fields.Description:
Last name. Region based validations will be applied to this field.
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `1`, *Maximum Length*: `25`, *Pattern*: `^[a-zA-Z0-9 \p{P}\p{S}]+$`

Fields.Name: phoneNumber
Fields.Description:
10-digit phone number of the format 5131234567.
**Constraints**: *Pattern*: `^[0-9]{10}$`

Fields.Name: phoneNumberExt
Fields.Description:
Phone number extension. Up to 8 digits of the format 12345678.
**Constraints**: *Maximum Length*: `8`, *Pattern*: `^[0-9]{1,8}$`

Fields.Name: phoneType
Fields.Description: Phone type.

Fields.Name: alternatePhone
Fields.Description:
10-digit alternate phone number of the format 5131234567.
**Constraints**: *Pattern*: `^[0-9]{10}$`

Fields.Name: alternatePhoneType
Fields.Description: Alternate phone type.

Fields.Name: faxNumber
Fields.Description:
10-digit fax number of the format 5131234567
**Constraints**: *Pattern*: `^[0-9]{10}$`

Fields.Name: email
Fields.Description:
Email address of the contact. Must have @ and a .
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `1`, *Maximum Length*: `64`, *Pattern*: `\b[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@(?:[A-Za-z0-9-]+\.)+[A-Za-z0-9]{2,}`

Fields.Name: ownershipPercentage
Fields.Description:
Ownership stake percentage.
**Constraints**: `>= 0`, `<= 100`

Fields.Name: dob
Fields.Description: Date of Birth (CCYY-MM-DD). Must be at least 18 years old.

Fields.Name: addressLine1
Fields.Description:
Address Line 1. Field for house number, street and direction.
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `1`, *Maximum Length*: `40`, *Pattern*: `^[a-zA-Z0-9 \p{P}\p{S}]+$`

Fields.Name: addressLine2
Fields.Description:
Address Line 2. Field for apartment or suite numbers, etc.
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `1`, *Maximum Length*: `40`, *Pattern*: `^[a-zA-Z0-9 \p{P}\p{S}]+$`

Fields.Name: city
Fields.Description: **Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `1`, *Maximum Length*: `28`, *Pattern*: `^[a-zA-Z0-9 \p{P}\p{S}]+$`

Fields.Name: state
Fields.Description: Valid US state, commonwealth, and territory codes are allowed.

Fields.Name: country
Fields.Description:
Only United States is allowed.
**Default**: `United States`

Fields.Name: postalCode
Fields.Description:
Postal code / zip code. The postal code must be valid for the address' country code.
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `5`, *Maximum Length*: `5`, *Pattern*: `^[0-9]{5}$`

Fields.Name: postalCodeExtension
Fields.Description:
Postal code / zip code extension. The postal code extension must be valid for the address' country code.
**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `4`, *Maximum Length*: `4`, *Pattern*: `^[0-9]{4}$`

Fields.Name: identification
Fields.Description: Optional. If any attribute in the identification object is populated then at least idNumber and idType are required.

Nodes.Title: Owner 1
Nodes.Name: Owner_1
Nodes.Description: A Control Owner is required for the following ownership types > LLC, PARTNERSHIP, PRIVATE CORPORATION, ASSOCIATION/ESTATE/TRUST, NON-PROFIT

Fields.Name: roleName
Fields.Description:
The role of the signer. Please note the below.

 1) Merchant role name is mandatory.
 2) Required fields indicated in schema are those required for all role names other than "SalesRep"
 3) The "SalesRep" role name only requires the following fields > roleName, signingExperience, signingOrder, firstName, lastName, email
 4) The "Signer2" role name is for a Personal Guarantor. This signer must be included if a Personal Guarantor is on the application. Include the Guarnator's information in this object.

Fields.Name: type
Fields.Description:

 2) For primary contact, firstName, lastName, phoneNumber and email are mandatory during POST.  
 3) For all other contact types, firstName and lastName are mandatory during POST.

Fields.Name: externalRefId

**Constraints**: *Minimum Length*: `1`, *Maximum Length*: `64`, *Pattern*: `\b[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@(?:[A-Za-z0-9-]+\.)+[A-Za-z0-9]{2,}`

Fields.Name: status
Fields.Description: Status of the signer

Fields.Name: lastUpdated
Fields.Description: Date contract was last updated

Fields.Name: dateSubmitted
Fields.Description: Date contract was last updated

Fields.Name: dateSent
Fields.Description: Date contract was sent

Fields.Name: dateDelivered
Fields.Description: Date contract was delivered

Fields.Name: dateSigned
Fields.Description: Date contract was signed

Fields.Name: signerRoleName
Fields.Description: Role of the signer

Fields.Name: signerExperience
Fields.Description: Method of sign

Fields.Name: externalRefId
Fields.Description:
A unique GUID generated by POST resource, used for retrieving and updating a deal. Do not send in the request, API will always generate one and assign it to the deal.
**Constraints**: *Maximum Length*: `36`, *Pattern*: `([0-9a-z]{8})-([0-9a-z]{4})-([0-9a-z]{4})-([0-9a-z]{4})-([0-9a-z]{12})`

Fields.Name: returnUrl
Fields.Description: The recipient will be directed to the returnUrl once signing is complete. For example on how it looks:  https://docusign.com/Signing/StartInSession.aspx?t=7f0d21a4-2798-402f-8b26-b12dbb37ae40

Fields.Name: embeddingUrl
Fields.Description: UI embeded link of the Docusign contract for the externalRefId.

Fields.Name: status
Fields.Description: UP or DOWN status of Lauchpad & it's downstream system.

Nodes.Description: Alternate phone type.

Nodes.Title: State
Nodes.Name: StateEnum
Nodes.Description: Valid US state, commonwealth, and territory codes are allowed.

Nodes.Title: Country
Nodes.Name: CountryEnum
Nodes.Description: Only United States is allowed.

Nodes.Title: Role Name
Nodes.Name: RoleNameEnum
Nodes.Description:
The role of the signer. Please note the below.

 1) Merchant role name is mandatory.
 2) Required fields indicated in schema are those required for all role names other than "SalesRep"
 3) The "SalesRep" role name only requires the following fields > roleName, signingExperience, signingOrder, firstName, lastName, email
 4) The "Signer2" role name is for a Personal Guarantor. This signer must be included if a Personal Guarantor is on the application. Include the Guarnator's information in this object.

Nodes.Title: Signing Experience
Nodes.Name: SigningExperienceEnum
Nodes.Description: Signing ceremony type

Nodes.Title: Address Type
Nodes.Name: AddressTypeEnum
Nodes.Description:
Address Type  
 1) Physical address is mandatory.
 2) If equipment needs to be sent to a different location than the physical address, then shipping address should be added.
3) For any address type, addressLine1, city, state, postalCode and country are mandatory.
